signIn.title: Welcome back
signIn.subtitle: Sign in to continue your career journey

welcome.title: Welcome to NovaWork Global!
welcome.subtitle: Let's unlock your career potential in just 60 seconds. We'll analyze your goals and show you exactly where you can go next.
welcome.feature1Description: Discover 3 personalized career paths based on your goals and the current job market
welcome.feature2Description: See salary ranges, demand levels, and required skills for each path
welcome.feature3Description: Answer 5 quick questions and get your Career Clarity Snapshot™ instantly

questions.title: Tell me about yourself
questions.subtitle: Answer 5 quick questions to get personalized career path recommendations
questions.question2: What's your top priority right now?
questions.jobTitlePlaceholder: e.g., Product Manager, Data Analyst, Software Engineer
questions.jobTitleHelp: Don't worry if you're not sure - just give us your best guess!
questions.analyzingYourProfile: Analyzing your profile and market data...

errors.enterJobTitle: Please enter your target job title

snapshot.title: Your Tell me about yourself
snapshot.subtitle: Based on your goals and current market data, here are 3 career paths tailored for you
snapshot.nextStepTitle: Ready to build your winning resume?
snapshot.nextStepDescription: Upload your existing resume or start from scratch. Our AI will help you create an ATS-optimized resume that gets interviews.

par.title: CAR Story Builder
par.subtitle: Challenge → Actions → Results
par.description: Capture your accomplishments using the proven CAR framework. These stories will become powerful resume bullets.
par.noStoriesHelp: Start by capturing your first accomplishment using the CAR framework
par.actionsHelp: List 2-3 key actions you took to solve the challenge
par.resultHelp: Quantify the outcome with metrics: $, %, time, volume, etc.
par.metricsHelp: Add specific numbers from your result (e.g., 40%, $2M, 3 months)
par.willDoAgain: Would I gladly do this again?
par.willDoAgainHelp: Check this to highlight work you want more of
par.competenciesHelp: Select the skills you used in this accomplishment

errors.metricsRequired: At least one metric is required

profile.title: Professional Profile
profile.subtitle: Create your positioning statement: who you are, what you do, and what makes you unique
profile.whoYouArePlaceholder: e.g., Service Business Leader with local and international experience in consulting firms
profile.coreSkillsPlaceholder: e.g., Expert at successfully starting up, developing, and growing outsourcing service firms
profile.softSkills: Soft skills aligned with target role
profile.softSkillsPlaceholder: e.g., Skilled at leading multicultural teams, managing complex projects, negotiating favorable deals...

workExperience.title: Work Experience
workExperience.companyDescPlaceholder: e.g., Global tech company, $50B revenue, 125 countries
workExperience.scopePlaceholder: e.g., Led team of 36, $12M budget across LATAM
